title: Conference
name: Kino Citadele
description: Kino Citadele - main conference venue, the largest cinema complex in the very centre of Riga.

title: Workshops
name: Mercure Hotel
description:
Workshops will take place at Mercure Hotel.

Please mention conference code RIGADEVDAY when you request the reservation at the hotel.

Classic Single room - 68.00 EUR per night.
Classic Double room - 73.00 EUR per night.

Price includes a rich breakfast buffet, free WIFI and VAT

title: Afterparty
name: Rockcafe
description: The official afterparty location after the fist conference day on Wednesday (March 2nd). Everyone is invited!

title: Avalon hotel
name: Avalon hotel
description:
Please mention conference code RIGADEVDAY when you request the reservation at the hotel.

Standard Single room EUR 55.00 per night.
Standard Double room EUR 60.00 per night.
Superior Single room EUR 60.00 per night.
Superior Double room EUR 70.00 per night.

Price includes a rich breakfast buffet, high speed WIFI and VAT. Additional discount for stays of 3 nights min 15%.
